events.message: I recently received my order, but the product arrived with a large scratch on the surface, which is quite disappointing.
The reported issue matches product defect cluster due to mention of scratch and damage upon arrival.
Assigning this product defect case to the support agent specialized in damaged items for further handling.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the scratch on your product. I’m here to help you get this resolved as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratched product and the packaging it arrived in? This will help us assess the damage.
I have attached several pictures showing the scratch on the product and the box it came in; please review them for reference.
Thank you for sending the photos. We can offer a replacement product or a full refund if that works better for you.
I would prefer to get a replacement as the product is exactly what I wanted, just disappointed it arrived damaged.
We have processed your replacement order, which should ship within 2 business days. We apologize again for the inconvenience.
Just checking in to confirm you received the replacement product and that it is in perfect condition.
Yes, I received the replacement quickly and it arrived without any damage. Thank you for resolving this so smoothly.
Closing this case now that the customer has confirmed full satisfaction with the replacement product.
